english_equivalent: Every cloud has a silver lining
meaning: With every problem comes a solution
proverb: जे बाढ़ि अनैत अछि, ओ नौका सेहो अनैत अछि
transliteration: Je barhi anait achhi, o nauka seho anait achhi
usage_context: Used to encourage someone facing difficulties

proverb: थारी मे भात, हाथ मे लाठी
transliteration: Thari me bhat, hath me lathi
usage_context: When advising someone to be cautious while moving forward
